name: The Gauntlet (blacksluggames)
description:
Shoot the Rock. Collect the Gems. Capture the Zones.

First to 6 points wins!

Player 1 controls:
Xbox controller
or
Keyboard:
WASD: Move
'F' Key: Shoot

Player 2 Controls:
Xbox controller
or
Arrow Keys: Move
Right CTRL: Shoot

'R' Key starts a new game

'M' Mute

'ESC' closes the game
